abstract: A new comedy series, "Harve Karbo," about a Los Angeles private investigator, would be the television project from Joel and Ethan Coen, the Academy Award-winning filmmakers of "Fargo" and "No Country for Old Men."
snippet: A new comedy series, "Harve Karbo," about a Los Angeles private investigator, would be the television project from Joel and Ethan Coen, the Academy Award-winning filmmakers of "Fargo" and "No Country for Old Men."

headline.main: Coen Brothers Producing Comedy Pilot for Fox
